DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the prevalence of hypertension among citizens of Holstebro, Denmark aged 55-64 years, including both the well treated, the untreated and the insufficiently treated, and to estimate the prevalence of white coat and masked hypertension using home blood pressure measurements with telemedical data transmission.
DOC.brief_title: Prevalence of Hypertension Using Telemedical Home Blood Pressure Measurements
DOC.criteria: Age 55 to 64 years Registered address in the municipality of Holstebro Enrolment at a practice of one of the GPs who had agreed to participate in the study. Unwillingness to participate Incapability to do home blood pressure measurements
